addLocationRequest(com.google.android.gm.Description: Adds one @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@ that the client is interested in. Settings will be checked for optimal performance of all @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@.

setAlwaysShow(boolean).Description: Always show the dialog, without the "Never" option to suppress future dialogs from this app. When this flag is set to true, the dialog will show up if the location settings do not satisfy the request, even if a user has previously chosen "Never". NOTE: Only use this method if your dialog is the result of an explicit user-initiated action that requires location to proceed. Canceling this dialog should also cancel the initiated action.

addAllLocationRequests(java.util.Collect.Description: Adds a collection of @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@ that the client is interested in. Settings will be checked for optimal performance of all @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@.

setNeedBle(boolean).Description: Sets whether the client wants BLE to be enabled.

build().Description: Creates a LocationSettingsRequest that can be used with @B_com#google#android#gms#location#SettingsApi_E@.
